element.panel_attributes:
/Human/ - -id: int -name: string - +getId(): int +getName(): string
+setId(newId: int): void +setName(newName: string): string
Actor - -actedMovies: ArrayList<Movie> - +addActedMovie(param: Movie): void +playsInMovie(param: Movie): void
Director - -directedMovies: ArrayList<Movie> - +directsInMovie(param: Movie): boolean +addDirectedMovie(param: Movie): void

Movie - -id: int -title: string -plot: string -genre: string -actors: ArrayList<Actor> -director: Director -release: Date -reviews: ArrayList<Review> -reviewAmount: int -averageReviewScore: float - +getId(): int +getTitle(): string +getPlot(): string +getGenre(): string +getActors(): ArrayList<Actor> +getDirector(): Director +getRelease(): Date +getReviews(): ArrayList<Review> +getReviewAmount(): int +getAverageReviewScore(): float
+setId(param: int): void +setTItle(param: String): void +setPlot(param: String): void +setGenre(param: String): void +setRelease(param: Date): void +setReviewAmount(param: int): void +setAverageReviewScore(param: float): void

Review - -reviewer: Reviewer -score: float -movie: Movie - +getReviewer(): Reviewer +getScore(): float +getMovie(): Movie
+setReviewer(param: Reviewer): void +setScore(param: float): void +setMovie(param: Movie): void

Reviewer - -name: string -reviews: ArrayList<Review> - +getName(): string +getReviews(): ArrayList<Review> +getReviewOf(param: Movie): Review
+setName(param: String): void +addReview(param: Review): void

MovieBase - -id: int -movies: ArrayList<Movie> -actors: ArrayList<Actor> -directors: ArrayList<Director> -reviewers: ArrayList<Reviewer> -reviews: ArrayList<Review> - +getId(): int +getMovies(): ArrayList<Movie> +getActors(): ArrayList<Actor> +getDirectors(): ArrayList<Director> +getReviews(): ArrayList<Review> +getReviewers(): -reviewers: ArrayList<Reviewer>
+setId(param: int): void +addMovie(param: Movie): void +addActor(param: Actor): void +addDirector(param Director): void +addReview(param: Review): void +addReviewer(param: Reviewer): void
